definition: Hønefoss, city (and soccer team) in Buskerud, Norway

sentences.english: "Don't resort to the shotgun approach, " Forster advises.
sentences.chinese: “不要把网铺得太开，”福斯特建议。

sentences.english: Outside the city centre, the largest suburban shopping areas are Gosforth and Byker.
sentences.chinese: 市中心外，格斯福斯和拜克是郊区最大的购物区。
福斯导演了五部故事片。

sentences.english: Edinburgh is the capital of scotland in the eastern part of the country on the firth of forth.
sentences.chinese: 爱钉是苏格兰首府，位于苏格兰东部的福斯湾畔。
我是大卫得福斯，美国之音新闻。

sentences.english: The capital of Scotland, in the eastern part of the country on the Firth of Forth.
sentences.chinese: 苏格兰首府，位于苏格兰东部的福斯湾畔。

sentences.english: Paphos Gate police station is continuing investigations.
sentences.chinese: 帕福斯门派出所正在继续调查。

sentences.english: John Foster held it to be the power of lighting one s own fire.
sentences.chinese: 约翰福斯特认为天赋是点燃自己热情的力量。

sentences.english: Our vodka is hand crafted by our master distiller in the United States.
sentences.chinese: 爱斯福斯冰狐伏特加在美国由酿酒师手工做成。

sentences.english: U. N. Ambassador John Danforth submitted his resignation after holding the job for less than six months .
sentences.chinese: 美国大使约翰丹福斯，在上任六个月就提交了的辞呈。

sentences.english: But the two men fell out in 1455, and Fust sued Gutenberg.
sentences.chinese: 但两人于1455年闹翻，福斯特控告了古滕伯格。

sentences.english: Cabaret, as filmed by Fosse, focused chillingly on the disparity between reality and illusion.
sentences.chinese: 福斯将电影尖锐的焦点对准了现实和幻想的背离。

sentences.english: He is going to run against Foster.

sentences.chinese: 福斯特警官的脸变红了。

sentences.english: He was an orphan and lived with his uncle.
sentences.chinese: 我的叔叔是个福斯塔夫式的人物。
